body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Park Fun   On-site activities include trying on 19th century clothing, solving puzzles and finding hidden clues throughout our exhibits and Poe's home. You never know what you'll discover at the Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site.     Junior Ranger Program   Ask for the Junior Ranger Activity booklet at the Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site. Use your junior detective skills to find clues and learn about the life and work of Edgar Allan Poe. Upon completion you will receive an official Junior Ranger certificate and badge.!   Or download them:   Edgar Allan Poe Junior Ranger Activity Booklet - Ages 5-7   Edgar Allan Poe  Junior Ranger Activity Booklet - Ages 8-12   Become a Web Ranger - Online
